definitions.definition: An odour left by an animal that may be used for tracing.

definitions.example: I believe the bloodhound has the best scent of all dogs.

definitions.definition: Any trail or trace that can be followed to find something or someone, such as the paper left behind in a paperchase.
To detect the scent of; to discern by the sense of smell.
definitions.example: The hounds scented the fox in the woods.
I scented trouble when I saw them running down the hill towards me.
Scent the air with burning sage before you begin your meditation.

definitions.definition: To hunt animals by means of the sense of smell.
